name: TheVillagesDailySunNewsMinute
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
This is a flash briefing of The Villages Daily Sun News Minute, which highlights the top articles in The Villages Daily Sun newspaper in The Villages, FL. 

After enabling this skill, say things like “Alexa, what’s my flash briefing” or “Alexa, what’s in the news” to hear your flash briefing. 

Go to Settings in your Alexa app and find “Flash Briefing” to move The Villages Daily Sun News Minute to the top of your news brief!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
